ComicInfo.Title: The Man without a City; Peep Shows; My Word; The Tube; A Nice Place to Visit, But...; Over & Under; New York City: The Future; The Battery's Down; Lotsa Yox; The Silent Minority; Token
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man without a City: After denouncing New York, a man is sentenced to spend the remainder of his life having no contact with the city.
Peep Shows: Archie Goodwin investigates peep shows.
My Word: Wood exaggerates New York's reputation for sleaze and sex.
The Tube: Brad Bickford is transported to another dimension where he is considered their long-prophesied champion.
A Nice Place to Visit, But...: The contrast between New York and California.
Over & Under: The contrasting lives of an office secretary and a prostitute.
New York City: The Future: A paranoid's glimpse into New York's future.
The Battery's Down: A new arrival in the city experiences a rapid dose of its downside.
Lotsa Yox: 1933 pilot has an unexpected encounter.
The Silent Minority: A day in the life of a hobo.
Token: A subway token is discovered in the far distant future.
